website_summaries.verdict: While the Oneplus 7 lacks the excitement of the 7 Pro, it's the sensible choice if you're shopping on a budget. Get this phone over the older 6T.
pros: The OnePlus 7 shares the Pro's powerful processor, has a great battery life and comes with a more affordable price tag
cons: Its lack of a pop-up selfie camera and additional wide-angle lens means it's more of a marginal upgrade over last year's OnePlus 6T than a variant of the OnePlus 7 Pro
There's no expandable storage or headphone jack, either

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need and more. OnePlus is still the flagship killer.
customer_reviews.text: The full package, everything you need in a phone and then some. Pre-applied screen protector, included clear case, 48mp back shooting camera that takes incredibly sharp images. Clean Android experience with tasteful additions from Oxygen OS. Beautiful and vibrant OLED display with a resultion that is just right for a phone this size. The fingerprint reader is unbelievably fast it exceeded my expectations. All of this for almost half the price of current flagship phones. This phone is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: David Roman III

customer_reviews.title: Super fast n amazing phone!
customer_reviews.text: One day delivery and well packed. Features 1. Super fast 2. Fast face unlock n screen fingerprint reader. 3. Nice camera 4. Works well with At&t gsm. 5. Dual SIM 6. Decent battery life n fast charging.
customer_reviews.author: Pallav

customer_reviews.title: Lost the time & lost the money
customer_reviews.text: Be carful to choose seller I read review and I thought that was a good, But it has problems. It hanging several times during working and lifetime the battery is short
customer_reviews.author: Ali Akbari

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone but not "the best" camera if that's what you want
customer_reviews.text: About 6 hours battery of always on Pokemon Go time. Very nice hardware design. Front facing camera notch is barely noticeable and can be hidden via built in OS setting. Came with a free clear flexible plastic case and an already applied plastic screen protector. Camera is not excellent but it's pretty nice. The in-screen fingerprint reader works about 97% of the time. Facial recognition for auto login is super fast and very accurate. Very good and clear audio for music playback. Overall an excellent phone.
customer_reviews.author: DLopan

customer_reviews.title: You don't know how great this phone really is until you actually have it.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking into several different unlocked phones to replace my current Android and Blackberry phones. I researched every aspect, I viewed many YouTube reviews of a handful top smartphones. I finally made the decision to get OnePlus 7.....and I LOVE IT!!! I absolutely love everything about this phone. It's so much more to it than any YouTube review could offer me. Battery life, functionality, customization, and most importantly, I got 2 of the best cases to protect it....Spigen Tough Armor and Spigen Liquid Air.
customer_reviews.author: Klemen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value on a fast and reliable phone
customer_reviews.text: This is my first tiime with OnePlus and I couldn't be more satisfied. Coming from an Android One phone I put great value on the clean and fast interface provided by Oxygen OS. In addition, I got excellent hardware and a very competitive camera. Yes, this is not the Pro version but I don't need it. I'd like better the compact design of this model when comparing it with the bigger Pro version.
customer_reviews.author: FSTB

customer_reviews.title: Full bars and lte on cricket
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. Everyone talks about the camera. But compared to my Stylo 4 it is perfect. Loads everything super fast and smooth. Literally everything I would want in a phone. I have cricket service. Att owned. Popped my sim in, set up by myself. And I have full lte and volte, nfc connects to WiFi perfectly. Display is great. Comes with us charger. Brand new sealed in box.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia billman

customer_reviews.title: Great phone at steal price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone at an affordable price. Have been using for last 1 month. Great dual camera matching the likes of i phone 11s and Galaxy 10. Battery lasts fot almost 2 days on regular usage.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone. Great Performance
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself deserves 5 stars. This is my first One Plus and to be honest I am impressed. It is so fast with my previous phone (I had Samsung S5 for a few years) it is just astounding. OnePlus do not have many models so they put all the focus in their flagships. I am giving it 4 stars because of seller, I had a question and the seller was not responsive at all
customer_reviews.author: Konstantin

customer_reviews.title: Best Cellphone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I came to USA. First I had second thought about buying this as it was not coming under warrenty. But after buying I think one shouldn't think about it because we will never need it. This is the best cellphone I had till now. There many Pros: 1. Snapdragon 855 Processor. Never hangs the phone. 2. Best Battery Life. 3. Very Fast Charging 4. Comes with US plug 5. All features works properly. Some cons were (negligible) 1. No warrenty 2. No popup camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ankur Yadav

customer_reviews.title: Solid Fully Featured Phone at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This phone has everything I was looking for in a flagship phone plus much more. It has 8GB or RAM, 256GB of storage and a 4,000ma battery. Battery goes for a couple of days no problem. Unlike other phones I've purchased recently this one has no trouble with GSM signal (AT&T in this case). Would recommend this phone to anyone. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This phone is really good for the price. I never used an Android before but since this phone I love it. I highly recommend to people who are somewhat on a budget and don't wanna buy the best of the best phones for the money. The phone felt a little big at the start but I quickly got used to it. The finger recognition can be better but the face recognition is one of the best. I haven't used the camera on many other flagship phones but I believe the one on this is very good. I don't really have any complaints. It even comes with a screen protector and a case.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. It’s such great quality for a great price! I’m interested in purchasing one for myself. The battery life and memory is abundant. Camera and audio quality are pristine. Smooth transition inserting American TMobile SIM card and LTE service is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plethora of issues
customer_reviews.text: Ive had a plethora of issues with this phone, they range from: 1) mic wont work (restart needed) 2) one speaker will work but the other wont (restart needed) 3) freezes 4) VoLTE wont turn off 5) bluetooth issues 6) connectivity issues: sim cards being turned off and on with no reason
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t dislike anything about this phone, and I will stick to this brand for sure. Amazon’s price is fair, and you get everything, you would get from the OnePlus store.
customer_reviews.author: Klaudia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. Very fast in every function. Lightweight and slim, it's easy to hold in a case. Wonderful battery life and the 48 mega pixel camera is unbelievable. Repeat OnePlus buyer.
customer_reviews.author: V. Jones

customer_reviews.title: A lot of phone for the money
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is so so. Very fast phone. Fingerprint sensor isn't bad; slower than a hardware based fingerprint reader but I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: I've used the phone for 7 months now. It's still a very smooth experience without any issues. The LTE bands include all heavily used US bands (I use Cricket/ATT network), so I get solid cellular data coverage everywhere. Camera is very good, and the screen is top notch. I dropped the phone several times to the hard surface from 2-3 feet, and despite using just the jelly case that came with the phone, I had no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Espectacular phone, but don't buy it for use in Colombia or Peru (As I have been able to check)
customer_reviews.text: This version (GM1900) is not honologated in Colombia or Peru ad this dont have FCC certification. Dont be wrong the phone is great, actually have better performance than other brands in these markets, but for some dumb reason this model is no homologated, this version is intented to be used only on Continental China. You can have it for 45 days on these otre countries and then the local authorities will block it because is no homologated by the law. The 1 star qualification is because this kind of things should be adviced. Check with you local authorities what models you can use on you local network.
customer_reviews.author: Julian V.

customer_reviews.title: Good price, great phone
customer_reviews.text: Switched from an iPhone 7 plus to this and I believe it was a great decision. This phone is comparable to the iPhone 11 and the S9/10 despite being cheaper than the others. Fingerprint and face scanner works quickly. The face scan even works in a dark room. However, the face scan feature can be annoying if you just want to pause, play, or skip songs on the lock screen or just seeing what notification you just received. If you don't already have a modern phone and don't want to blow your bank account, then this phone is a perfect choice.
customer_reviews.author: SEG

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work in Ecuador and Colombia
customer_reviews.text: I putted five stars because I loved the phone. Check if you country accepts phones without the FCC certification (this phone doesn't have it because it isn't available in the USA market). Ecuador and Colombia doesn't homologate phones without that certification. Sadly I had to return it but it was a great phone. If you have the money go for the OnePlus 7 pro (it has the FCC certification).
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Moran

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on Verizon
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to see if it could work on Verizon but the note says not to open it so that sucks. I honestly like the OP7 but I'll consider the OP6T if OnePlus has it up for sale again. Not a fan of the rounded edges on the 7 Pro but it's $500 with some great specs and a bezel-less screen so maybe. Although I'm okay with downgrading a bit and dropping $600 on the Galaxy S10e instead. I'll probably never use the headphone jack since I'm all about that wireless earbuds life. lol
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone, recommended
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful phone, camera is amazing, even the crappy new iPhone can't beat this phone! I have 6T, got this for the wife! Battery life easily lasts whole day and more, smooth OS, no bloatware, clean android. Only complaint no usb c to 3.5 mm adapter.
customer_reviews.author: H. The IT guy!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this phone approximately 1 month ago and I must say it has reached my expectations. Firstly it has excellent battery life... With normal phone usuage such as using all social media platforms and take photos the battery usually last all day! The camera is great! I can capture all my memories even at night and everything is displayed clearly. I have compared the camera to iphone 8 plus and this camera is better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great performance for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The phone has a wonderful battery life and amazing AAA manufacturing quality and feel while the only downside I have experienced is a sub par under screen fingerprint reader. It tends to read about 75% of the time even after you wipe the screen clean. But accessories come with a free case and a fast charger that takes about 30 minutes to fully charge. The screen can be finicky though if multitasking during calls and go dark thinking you have the phone against your ear and requires you to hit the power button and sign in again. Besides the small irritations it has an amazing battery and feel with a generous screen size and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: No operating system updates for the OnePlus 7 in the US market
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the phone. But only two stars because, after wondering for a few weeks why I haven't received the OS 10 upgrade, I contacted and Amazon and OnePlus. One Plus told me that the OnePlus 7 wasn't marketed to the US, and that there will be on operating system upgrades. Un-freaking-believable!
customer_reviews.author: Ed DeCleva

customer_reviews.title: Go Oneplus
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cell phone. Has all of the flagship specs without the flagship cost. Go Oneplus
customer_reviews.author: Bilal

customer_reviews.title: So far the best phone i ever had !
customer_reviews.text: Ive initial bought an 8gb model but then i switched to 12gb after 6 months in. I was so happy with it that i bought one for my dad as well. This phone is a beast on all levels. Best phone youll ever buy as a traveler im telling you! Ive traveled 4 different countries is SE Asia and 5 in Europe any sim card ive pit in worked right off the bat!!! No need fo setting no nothing i think that few times i didn't even need to reset the device. Picture quality for the price is more then great especially the night time options.
customer_reviews.author: Tsanko

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again, if I lost this one. No regrets.
customer_reviews.text: Still climbing the Android learning curve after two iPhones and two Windows phone's - both of which I loved, but the power/price and reviews of OnePlus lured me. Very happy overall. Pros: easy setup, nice in-hand feel, great screen, nice specs. Built in features keep surprising and delighting: Step counter, Google integration, social media integration, photo handling, fast access buttons, more. Cons: finger print reader wouldn't set up. No wireless charging. Frequent screen captures by accident while grasping phone.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Van Zile

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is the fastest, sleekest phone I've ever had my hands on. On the box came a fast charger adapter for the wall, a USB cable that, although short, is incredibly sturdy and a simple plastic case for protection. So far I ve not found anything I dislike about it, the camera gets a little bit to get used to since you have a "Pro" mode which allows you to change ISO, white balance and some other super useful configurations. If you don't feel like learning about it, just use the standard camera and the quality remains the same
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's what I expected and more... This phone is worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Well packed and delivery in time. Everything you need in a phone and then some. Fast face unlock and the fingerprint reader is unbelievably fast it exceeded my expectations. Back shooting camera that takes incredibly sharp images. With Dual SIM that for me is necessary, decent battery life and fast charging.. Pre-applied screen protector, included clear case. OLED display with a resultion that is just right for a phone this size. All of this for almost half the price of current flagship phones.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from the OP5. Just popped my sim card in and ran OnePlus Switch to easily move all of my data over. Everything was set within minutes! Phone is beautiful and the case is a very nice bonus because I wouldn't ever want this phone to be without a case (mirror back, and slippery like most phones these days). Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: Been using the OnePlus 7 for a few months now and it's definitely worth the price. Overall it's great for photos, videos, mobile games and etc. The only issue I had was finding a case I liked for it. Not very many options. I'm still using the case and screen protector that came with it and so far they both do a great job of protecting the phone. I've already dropped my phone quite a few times and no scratches so far.
customer_reviews.author: Pa Xiong

customer_reviews.title: An affordable flagship that doesn't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with purchase and I would recommend the OnePlus 7. I have only been using this phone for one week but no issues with T-Mobile, making calls, receiving and sending texts, wifi and bluetooth connectivity, and moving from apps to apps. I was looking at the Pixel 3XL and the 7Pro and for the price and performance I am happy I went with the 7.
customer_reviews.author: John Weber

customer_reviews.title: One plus 7 pro is a beast
customer_reviews.text: Paid 44 total for this device. Comes with 8gb ND a 855 chipset faster then a a12 apple chip. Also 256gb hard drive. Extremely fast phone and great for the money. If it breaks I'll buy it again or next year's edition.
customer_reviews.author: ToddyA

customer_reviews.title: Nothing bad to say!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this phone. The screen is very bright and easy to read. It has a much better GPS location reader. The battery lasts a lot longer than my pixel 2. I was able to seamlessly transfer all my contacts and data.
customer_reviews.author: A.E. Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this phone, great battery life and specs. It is incredibly fast and runs all games well. The camera is quite good as well. Comes with a screen protector already installed by the manufacturer and a nice clear case. Arrived fast and ready to use with T-mobile sim.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing performance for a great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love the way the phone looks and feels very premium. It has blazing fast performance with a great combination of hardware and software. Battery life and charging speed are very impressive. I dont take pictures often but the camera is also really good. I recommend getting the spigen liquid air case, keeps the phone protected, covers the camera bump and looks awesome. Overall this is an amazing phone for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ankur

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Oneplus is a great phone manufacturer. I purchased this phone as a gift after owning they Oneplus 7 pro myself. This phone is just as good. The constant updates and they oxygen OS build make this phone a great investment as you know OnePlus will support the device for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Good device, os is great and responsive, all touch and gesture work great, battery lasts more than a day which had not happened in my past phones as i use a lot. Lot of space and its very zippy, had lot of power with 8gb Ram and processor Sometimes when taking with phone touching the ears the screen doesn't stay black and i end up with buttons or numbers getting pressed. No head phone jack.
customer_reviews.author: Seshan

customer_reviews.title: Love it .. minus one thing
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this phone except for one thing: the auto brightness does not adjust well with the changing light of the day. I am always having to adjust the brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice.
customer_reviews.text: Bad network Bad speaker coherence. Sometimes one speaker didn't work. Need to restart the phone to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Kiran Pandey

customer_reviews.title: Superior Performance to All Phone on the Market
customer_reviews.text: The Phone is very fast, superior performance than all Brand names on the market. There is NONE to compare and Great SPEED. Superior battery life, power, and Battery performance. It is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Yahisrael

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value for money
customer_reviews.text: As an iPhone user for 10 years, I've been blown away by the 1+. This is a remarkable phone for a low price. I love the fast-charging, the large screen with minimal notch and the multiple login options. And the Zen Mode is also great for productivity.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Phone's incredibly fast, faster than my redmi note 4 at least. Screen is immersive, speakers are loud and the sound is crisp. Amazing value for money
customer_reviews.author: Harshavardhan Bachina

customer_reviews.title: Great value, camera isn't that bad
customer_reviews.text: Overall great value for below $450 in late 2019. Will recommend. Been using it for the past couple months on mint mobile in US. Good signal. System is clean, play store works fine. Good battery life. Face recognition is fast, but fingerprint reader is just ok - compare to traditional fingerprint reader. Screen is nice. And camera...it's not that bad at all. Processor is fast, big memory, and lots of storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Best phone i have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Loaded 4000 photos from previous phones and i am only utilizing 17% storage. I am rarely below half battery after a full day's use. Got a little buggy at times until i got some updates. Camera is baller-crazy low light abilities.
customer_reviews.author: Micah McGrew

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long - 6 months in
customer_reviews.text: it took a minute to get everything in order, but runs great and I am very happy. 6 months in: battery runs super hot and phone dies in 4 hours if you need to use it. The microphone now doesn't work properly.
customer_reviews.author: kalamanalu

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! My mom liked it to much she ordered another one. Great deal and a great phone. My girlfriend had an IPhone XS and she’s always wanting to use my phone for pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: The proof is in the pudding
customer_reviews.text: I have had the phone for a week now and it is living up to its billing. Great phone I am totally satisfied. I have no complaints whatever. OnePlus is an awesome brand. The only drawback if it can be called that, is the fact that I had to do research on to find out about this brand. They need to do more advertising.
customer_reviews.author: andrew e rahming

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I’ve made.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this cell in every way. The battery is great, the camera is excellent and the best is the fast way the phone works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best phone for what I want it and use it
customer_reviews.text: I love it, there is still room for improvement on the fingerprint scanner but still my favorite brand ONEPLUS, keep it up!
customer_reviews.author: DOM_9

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pro's: Storage, Camera, price. Con's: Chinese Note: I'm with MetroPCS and it did not automatically work after slipping in the card. But called with some information and they turned it on for free.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence S McHatten

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good product, works perfect till now. I was one of the few people who had one plus's first phone one plus 1. Back in 2014 I would say they have inmproved their priducts over time and this phone, in my opinion, is one of the best in tge maket. Will update in the future if anything is new. The camera, howerever, is not as perfect as i had expected with 48 MP, but still campures nice pic.
customer_reviews.author: Bereket Zate

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I was using iPhones for quite some year and just couldnt justified their price point vs their hardware specification - this phone is very good and the more you use, the more you will like it. I was able to download an app on th Google play store that mimic the assistive touch function I had on the iPhone, so problem solved for me! 8GB ram and sb855 - faster than most tablet out there!
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is the Chinese market version but comes with the Oxygen OS from the European version. So far everything works great. Managed to update to Android 10 with no issues and currently running dual SIM att-Mexican and Verizon (had to call them to enable the CDMA-less service)
customer_reviews.author: osiris loera

customer_reviews.title: Skip the 6t and get this bad boy
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased a 6t from OnePlus for the same price and would say the 7 is faster and the fingerprint unlock (if you care like I do) is very fast. I'm in US and using att with no issues with connection. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone, perfect price
customer_reviews.text: The OnePlus 7 is absolutely fantastimc. I love every detail of it and I cannot think of a single complaint. I have T-Mobile and get excellent service on it in the United States. I would definitely recommend to anyone in the phone market. Switching phones is easy with the OnePlus switch app, as it transfers all your data.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Upgrade from 1+5. This is fastml and smooth. Finger printer senor is awesome
customer_reviews.author: dr650se

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret it. Best OP7.
customer_reviews.text: This is first time I bought OP7. I love it. I never had expensive phones. I was thinking to return when it expensive,this phone changed my mind to keep it when it didn't slow me down. It keep running fresh... Even my friend have iPhone x told me that OP7 speaker is louder than his.
customer_reviews.author: Itachi

customer_reviews.title: Apps Freeze
customer_reviews.text: The programs /apps froze frequently so I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Giberson

customer_reviews.title: Dual speakers oh yeah
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, first one came with a defect but got a replacement that works perfectly fine
customer_reviews.author: ruben

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this phone! Camera quality is amazing, facial and finger print reader works perfect and battery life has been good so far
customer_reviews.author: Swarchaa Kataria

customer_reviews.title: Great high-end phone without a high-end pricetag
customer_reviews.text: The OnePlus 7 has tons of storage and the battery life is great. Incan stream music all day and still have at least half a charge when I get home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Longer lasting battery
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for the battery life and it has not let me down. Another feature that I love about this is the camera. The clicks look beautiful and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Suresh Narayanan

customer_reviews.title: Flagship phone at great price!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this OnePlus 7 & this is second phone purchase from buyerush, factory charger with screen protector & case. No dislikes.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Record

customer_reviews.title: Superb phone for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with the battery life and the amount of storage. Also, like size, and resolution of screen. Still learning all the capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Martin

customer_reviews.title: Overall : It is the best phone in the market.
customer_reviews.text: Overall : It is the best phone in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Dany

customer_reviews.title: The phone work only for 2 months
customer_reviews.text: The phone works only for 2 months, and it is a new phone. It just developed charging problem, and it doesn't power on again. Unfortunately, the return period was over b4 the problem started. How can a new phone only works for 2 months, it shows that the phone is fake.
customer_reviews.author: someone

customer_reviews.title: Great phone overall - proximity sensors are lacking.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great phone, great processor, memory, very good pictures, etc., but the proximity sensors are an issue. Whenever I'm listening to a WhatsApp audio file or anything else, for some God forsaken reason, it reads something near and cuts any audio I'm listening to. Otherwise, a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: David Agurcia

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for money 2019.
customer_reviews.text: Best Value for money. Runs smoothly, already updated to oxygen 10.3. same experience as the 7pro
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone!!
customer_reviews.text: The phone is amazing thank you so much buyerush! If any of you are thinking about ordering the one plus 7 international model I reccomend this seller! Awesome customer service nothing seemed out of the ordinary. Theres a reason buyerush is in the top 11,000 on amazon you guys are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Every thing you get in this phone good display ,fast fingerprint scanner, good battery life . For the negatives i would recommend samsung for the camera department rather than oneplus 7.
customer_reviews.author: Pratik

customer_reviews.title: Great device.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this phone. It's like having the perfect rom. Much customization, great battery.
customer_reviews.author: Edward McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Is a very good cellphone. My expectations was gratefully fulfilled!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Xochilt

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love it all. Upgraded from a two year old iPhone 7 so this is a big jump and i can't say i have any complaints. It arrived a day earlier than Amazon said and it works wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: It's such a great phone the finger print may not work as the ones in the back but the face recognition is so fast that it's not a problem. Any app runs smoothly and the ram can keep it in the background for so long that i hardly see any app load, such a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Armando Jarquin Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone for the price! Great face recognition!
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much like everything about this phone except the fingerprint reader. Its just not very good, its a little slow and does very poor at recognizing a dirty finger even if only slightly dirty. It would be nice to have a notification LED but thats not a huge deal to me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PHONE
customer_reviews.text: at least one of the best phone, but if you are planing to use it in Colombia, dont buy it! it can be homologated in colombia because dont have FCC certification! best regards
customer_reviews.author: Camilo Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone. Product arrived within 2 days. Was brand new in a sealed original packaging. Best value for money. Would recommend this phone and the seller too
customer_reviews.author: haris khan

customer_reviews.title: It didnt open anymore :(
customer_reviews.text: After 5-6 mos the phone didnt work anymore 😖 i feel sad now :( i thought the phone gonna last years :( it was so sudden :(
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Powerful. Fast. Huge storage capacity. Half the price of latest iphones or top android s with similar or less capabilities. Cons? No audio jack and no barometric sensor
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo G Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Good upgrade
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Really good phone. I have been using it for two months and it has amazed with a great display. It is really snappy. The only thing that I would point out is the camera, it could be much better (it isn't bad, but is far from being perfect)
customer_reviews.author: Giacomo Dibi

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good phone with 30% off compared with Tier one phone but with the same performance. Had bought another one for office.
customer_reviews.author: kuangyitsai

customer_reviews.title: Camera and battery
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone. I had a OP One and las 5 years and still was competitive in all fields. This one does everything good. Camera are grate and very ease to use. Alot of storage. No doubt about this, buy the phone!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: No micro SD card slot
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone. Only issue for me is no micro SD card, but 256 gb internal storage should be good.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Add another positive review to the list. Works great on T-mobile in the US (and other GSM). Price is great for a flagship level phone from Spring 2019. After a few weeks, I'm still completely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Dunkerley

customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone, outstanding price and neat camera. 10/10 would buy OnePlus again.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Screen dead after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of use the screen has line of dead spots basically rendering it useless. Very disappointed in the quality of this product. Wish the company would stand behind its product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G.

customer_reviews.title: Oneplus delivers on what it has stood for
customer_reviews.text: Everything perfectly fine, awesomely big screen, OK finger pri t scanner, great camera and wonderful performance overall.
customer_reviews.author: Weird Praani

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone for a Ridiculous low price
customer_reviews.text: Right now this cellphone just blew my mind, I didn't expect to be so good for this price. I recommend this cellphone for anyone and for the price is so good is perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Henry Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Overall phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent !!! The only thing to say is that the instructions manual and the package itself everything was in chinese
customer_reviews.author: Kawal

customer_reviews.title: Oneplus 7
customer_reviews.text: Best flagship phone, snapdragon, adreno, 8 Gb ram and 256Gb of memory for such a low price!
customer_reviews.author: DR988

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Phone works great! It's super responsive and the camera is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone and configuration
customer_reviews.text: The phone quality, camera quality is really good. Worth the price. The configuration is too good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Roshan

customer_reviews.title: the fastest and best value  cell
customer_reviews.text: the fingerprint and face recognition is amazing. The speed to unblock is out of the question. highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Candido

customer_reviews.title: Its an excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Its an excellent buy. The battery, touch screen, everything works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Just great. Have everything you need. Great for playing high end games on it. That 90hz screen refresh rate is just great.
customer_reviews.author: Aung Zin Paing

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent with t-mobile
customer_reviews.text: I get long battery life and is a very good phone, I use this with metro-pcs (T-Mobile) and get full bars
customer_reviews.author: Steven West

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Cool phone. I got messed up fingers, so fingerprint sensor don't work well. Other than that all good.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe B

product_meta.title: OnePlus 7 GM1900 256GB, 6.41 inches, Dual SIM, 8GB, Dual Main Camera 48MP+5MP, GSM Unlocked International Model, No Warranty (Mirror Gray)
product_meta.description: Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carrier such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint. Please check if your GSM cellular carrier supports the bands for this model before purchasing, LTE may not be available in all areas: 2G: GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 - SIM 1 & SIM 2 CDMA 800 / 1900 & TD-SCDMA, 3G: HSDPA 800 / 850 / 900 / 1700(AWS) / 1800 / 1900 / 2100, 4G bands: LTE band 1(2100), 2(1900), 3(1800), 4(1700/2100), 5(850), 7(2600), 8(900), 12(700), 13(700), 17(700), 18(800), 19(800), 20(800), 26(850), 28(700), 29(700), 32(1500), 34(2000), 38(2600), 39(1900), 40(2300),41(2500) Oneplus 7 GM1900 (China Model), THIS IS NOT the PRO version! Display: 6.41 inches, Memory: 8GB/256GB, MAIN CAMERA: Dual 48 MP+ 5MP, Single: 16 MP, OS: Android 9.0 (Pie); OxygenOS 9.5.5, Chipset:Qualcomm SDM855 Snapdragon 855 , CPU: Octa-core , GPU Adreno 640. This device may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international items. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information. The box contains: Your new device, USB cable, Charger , Clear Case, Documentation.
